updates.HtmlString: Updated marketing cards to be more accurate for set, plus set chances as 1:3 token:marketing for core sets, 2:3 for expansions, and 9:1 as of Battle for Zendikar.
Updated foil chances. Now 15/67 chance a booster has a foil, includes basic lands, and staring with this set, it always replaces a common.
Evening: Upgraded to newest version, added all Prerelease pack-ins, and added Fat Pack.
10am MST: Bug fixed: The seeded booster's rare slot now has a 1/8 chance of an on-colour God, not just any mythic rare. Thanks, Scipion!

7am MST: Bug fixed: The seeded booster now contains promo card, on-colour rare, on-colour uncommon, off-colour uncommon, multi-color on-colour uncommon, and 11 commons, as per Theros pattern. Thanks, Stefan!
10pm MST: Bug fixed: The seeded booster only contains multi-colour cards with the proper colours now. And the proper tokens are now in.
5pm MST: Set complete. All cards added (well, the proper tokens are still coming...)
